info.author: David Rose
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
This is Paloma, a program to manage a database of digital music files
(typically in MP3 form, although not necessarily) and facilitate their
retrieval and playback in interesting ways.  It's intended to replace
a traditional CD player/changer system; without too much effort, you
can rip your entire CD collection and store it on your hard disk for
instant random access.
info.name: paloma
info.html_description: This is Paloma, a program to manage a database of digital music files (typically in MP3 form, although not necessarily) and facilitate their retrieval and playback in interesting ways. It’s intended to replace a traditional CD player/changer system; without too much effort, you can rip your entire CD collection and store it on your hard disk for instant random access.
